message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.RO, cs.SY

The paper deals with reinforcement learning using neural networks, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the issue of catastrophic interference, which is a common problem in neural networks and is often addressed in the subfields of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and neural networks (cs.NE). The proposed method involves using a self-organizing map, which is a technique commonly used in robotics (cs.RO) and control systems (cs.SY). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.NE, followed by cs.RO and cs.SY.
